*.description: May configure the email notification configuration for repositories

notify.description: May configure the email notification configuration

formHelpText.contactList: The list of emails receiving the notifications
formHelpText.sendToRepositoryContact: Send the email to the repository contact
formHelpText.useAuthorAsFromAddress: Use the author email address as the from field of the email
formHelpText.usePrettyDiff: Send the diffs in pretty format
formHelpText.maxDiffLines: The maximum number of diff lines included in the email
